channel.title: [Delta] Making NPC dialogues
channel.description:
inb4 Delta sucks - I'm using the complete cleaned verison, works fine for me
Anywho. I'm having a little trouble with NPC dialogues. I followed a tutorial i found somewhere about adding a quest, which also had a few npc dialogues. The thing is, 1/2 of the dialogue stuff was missing from the tutorial (The yes / no function doesn't work, most of the time when you click "Click here to... " nothing happens etc.)
I've been searching for other tutorials on how to make NPC dialogues, but frankly, I can't find any =\
So, could someone please explain to me how to add a NPC dialogue, or atleast how to add a Yes / No function (As in: "Do you want to help the man?" -"Yeah, why not" -"no, I've got better things to do"
Regards, SirPali

item.title: [Delta] Making NPC dialogues
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Nubz:

So you finally figured that out sir?

Yeah took a while, but finally found it.
All the tutorials featuring NPC dialogues where based on old sources where the options to accept a choice were handled in Client.java.
In my source it was stuffed away in ActionButtons.java, and didn’t have any commenting.
Hence why it took a while to figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Making NPC dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Nubz Nubz
item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

[quote=“SirPali, post:20, topic:327085”]EDIT:

My god I actually found it!
The problem was in Actionbuttons.java
Fixed now, works as a charm[/quote]So you finally figured that out sir?

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Making NPC dialogues
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

EDIT:

My god I actually found it!
The problem was in Actionbuttons.java
Fixed now, works as a charm

item.title: [Delta] Making NPC dialogues
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Right. This isn’t helping me get any further. Ill post my entire NPC dialogue part.

First click npc:

[code]
if ((NPCID == 2244) && (startQ == 0)) {
NpcDialogue = 7;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
if ((NPCID == 2244) && (startQ == 1)) {
NpcDialogue = 12;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

		if ((NPCID == 2244) && (startQ == 2)) {
			NpcDialogue = 14;
			NpcDialogueSend = false;
		}

		if ((NPCID == 2244) && (startQ == 3)) {
			NpcDialogue = 16;
			NpcDialogueSend = false;
		} [/code]

Dialogue cases:

[code]
switch (NpcDialogue) {
// Dialogen voor quest
case 7:
talk(“Hello. Welcome to Nightfall, a land lost in time.”, 2244); // 2244 is the npc id
break;

	case 8:
		talk2("What would you-WAIT enough of that,", "I need your help...",
				2244);
		break;

	case 9:
		changeText126("Help Him?", 2460);
        changeText126("Yes", 2461);
        changeText126("No", 2462);
        sendFrame164(2459);
		break;
		
	case 10:
		talk("I need you to kill 5 men, 7 rats, and 3 goblins", 2244);
		startQ = 1;
		break;

	case 11:
		talk("Come back if you ever need a quest!", 2244);
		break;

	case 12:
		talk("You need to kill " + menDiff + " more Men, " + gobDiff
				+ " more Goblins, and", 2244);
		break;

	case 13:
		talk("" + ratDiff + " more Rats", 2244);
		break;

	case 14:
		if (startQ == 2){
		talk("That will show those Good for nothing Pests!", 2244);
		}
		break;

	case 15:
		if (startQ == 2){
		talk("Here is a nice weapon and stylish armour in return.", 2244);
		addItem(2593, 1);
		addItem(2595, 1);
		addItem(2597, 1);
		addItem(2591, 1);
		addItem(2922, 1);
		addItem(2914, 1);
		addItem(1327, 1);
		startQ = 3;
		QP += 2;
		addSkillXP(2500, 0);
		addSkillXP(2500, 1);
		}
		break;

	case 16:
		talk("Thanks again for doing that quest for me.", 2244);
		break;
	}[/code]

Case 40:

[code]
case 40:
if (NpcDialogue == 7 || NpcDialogue == 8 || NpcDialogue == 12
|| NpcDialogue == 14) {
NpcDialogue += 1;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
} else {
closeInterface();
}

		if (NpcDialogue == 15) {
			clearQuestInterface();
			sendQuest("You have recieved: ", 4911);
			sendQuest("You have completed Getting Started!", 4913);
			sendQuest("Full Black (G) and a Black Scimitar.", 4914);
			sendQuest("2.5k Attack and Defence experience.", 4915);
			sendQuest("2 Quest Points.", 4916);
			sendQuest("Gold Gloves and boots.", 4918);
			showInterface(4909);
		}
		break; [/code]

I must be doing something wrong here, but what?

Read full topic

So, could someone please explain to me how to add a NPC dialogue, or atleast how to add a Yes / No function (As in: “Do you want to help the man?”
